text:
でも船長は
トドメを
喰らいに
起きたの
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 7.08%;top: 1.96%;width: 12.13%;height: 5.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
だから私は
バンジョーを
握って…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.21%;top: 13.65%;width: 9.55%;height: 3.43%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
すぐに
船を奪い
岸に戻したわ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.52%;top: 20.61%;width: 13.15%;height: 5.07%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
その日
グリバス市の
みんなが…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.45%;top: 21.14%;width: 13.03%;height: 4.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
覚えたわ
その名はプリシラ…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 75.84%;top: 20.20%;width: 17.19%;height: 2.82%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: transparent;left: 41.57%;top: 34.96%;width: 21.46%;height: 2.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: bold;text-shadow: white 2px 0px,  white -2px 0px, white 0px -2px, white 0px 2px, white 2px 2px , white -2px 2px, white 2px -2px, white -2px -2px, white 1px 2px,  white -1px 2px, white 1px -2px, white -1px -2px, white 2px 1px,  white -2px 1px, white 2px -1px, white -2px -1px;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 16.97%;top: 54.13%;width: 7.42%;height: 2.09%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 74.04%;top: 55.36%;width: 8.65%;height: 2.37%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
待てよ。
お前魚か?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.85%;top: 70.69%;width: 11.12%;height: 3.39%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.13%;top: 69.54%;width: 6.85%;height: 2.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ほら。
分かる?
小さな
ヒレ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 17.19%;top: 73.67%;width: 9.55%;height: 4.42%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.15%;top: 76.74%;width: 10.11%;height: 2.62%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 57.98%;top: 69.38%;width: 11.12%;height: 2.09%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
何マイルも
船を追えるって
魚以外にある?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 57.42%;top: 76.41%;width: 15.62%;height: 5.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 62.25%;top: 84.42%;width: 8.65%;height: 1.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.10%;top: 87.20%;width: 6.97%;height: 2.09%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;
